name: Rocket Dinarius, S. de R.L. de C.V.
description: Developer of a financial platform designed to improve users' credit scores and financial health. The company's platform assists customers with an important and difficult decision to get credit reports, scores, and other financial information, enabling users to achieve financial goals in an efficient, responsible, and organized manner and get control over their money.
one_liner: Developer of a financial platform designed to improve users' credit scores and financial health. The company's platform assists customers with an important and difficult decision to get credit reports, scores, and other financial information, enabling users to achieve financial goals in an efficient, responsible, and organized manner and get control over their money.
